Practice_Name: Access control policy and system access
Practice_Description: Implement access control so that only authorized users, processes, and devices can access systems handling CUI.
Assessment_Objectives_Summary: Meet all NIST SP 800-171A assessment objectives for 3.1.1 (identify authorized subjects and enforce access restrictions).

Practice_Description: Ensure authorized users can only execute permitted transactions and functions on systems processing CUI.
Assessment_Objectives_Summary: Meet all 800-171A objectives for 3.1.2 (define roles and restrict actions to those roles).

Practice_Description: Control the flow of CUI within and outside systems according to approved authorizations.
Assessment_Objectives_Summary: Demonstrate that data flows are documented

Practice_Description: Use multifactor authentication for network access to privileged and non-privileged accounts.
Assessment_Objectives_Summary: Show MFA configurations and verify AOs that privileged and remote access uses MFA.

Practice_Description: Create and retain audit logs of events relevant to the security of CUI systems.
Assessment_Objectives_Summary: Implement logging for key events and meet 800-171A AOs for 3.3.1.
